metadata.title: CVE-2018-19873 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.11.3. QBmpHandler has a bufferoverflow via BMP data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19873` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqt5concurrent5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5core5a - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5dbus5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5gui5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5libqgtk2 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5network5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5opengl5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5printsupport5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5sql5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5sql5-mysql - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5sql5-odbc - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5sql5-psql - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5sql5-sqlite - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5sql5-tds - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5test5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5widgets5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
libqt5xml5 - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
qt5-default - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
qt5-qmake - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
qt5-qmake-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
qtbase5-examples - 5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.1+dfsg-16ubuntu7.6').
